title: Hewlett-Packard To Split Into Two Companies
teaser: Tech giant Hewlett-Packard is planning on splitting into two separate companies to cut costs and restructure.
contentencoded:
Tech giant Hewlett-Packard is planning on splitting into two separate companies: one focused on selling personal computers and printers, and the other focused on corporate technology services.

The split is expected to happen in 2015, and it’s part of a series of steps HP has taken in the past few years to cut costs and restructure, including eliminating tens of thousands of jobs.

Here & Now’s Robin Young talks to NPR’s senior business editor Marilyn Geewax about the split and its expected consequences.

Guest
